targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") AS "value" FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("available_percent") AS "value" FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
select mean(load1) as load1 from "system" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc
select mean(load5) as load5 from "system" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc
select mean(load15) as load15 from "system" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc
select mean(total) as total from "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
select mean(used) as used from "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
select mean(cached) as cached from "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
select mean(free) as free from "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
select mean(buffered) as buffered from "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
select mean(usage_idle) as idle from "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
select mean(usage_user) as user from "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
select mean(usage_system) as system from "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
select mean(usage_softirq) as softirq from "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
select mean(usage_steal) as steal from "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
select mean(usage_nice) as nice from "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
select mean(usage_irq) as irq from "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
select mean(usage_iowait) as iowait from "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
select mean(usage_guest) as guest from "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
select mean(usage_guest_nice) as guest_nice from "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
select mean(inodes_free) as free from "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
select mean(inodes_used) as used from "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
select mean(total) AS total from "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
select mean(used) as used from "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
select mean(free) as free from "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
select mean(used) as used from "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
select mean(total) as total from "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
select mean(in) as in from "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
select mean(out) as out from "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(used_percent) as used FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean("n_cpus") FROM "docker" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("memory_total") FROM "docker" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT last("n_containers") FROM "docker" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_used_file_descriptors") FROM "docker" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_images") FROM "docker" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_goroutines") FROM "docker" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_percent") as "usage" FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_percent") as "usage" FROM "docker_container_mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_bytes"),1s)/8 as "rx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_bytes"),1s)/8 as "tx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_packets"),1s) as "rx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_packets"),1s) as "tx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_dropped"),1s) as "rx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_dropped"),1s) as "tx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_errors"),1s) as "rx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_errors"),1s) as "tx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
